LanguageData.FactionGreetingHostile_Cheech: {0} screeches something only cheechers could understand into the microphone and disconnects.
LanguageData.FactionGreetingHostileAppreciative_Cheec: Hissing and screeching angrily, {0} demands that you make a gesture of unity, like bringing gifts to one of {0_possessive} settlements or releasing {0_possessive} faction's prisoners unharmed. Until then, {0_pronoun} is unwilling to talk.\n\nHissing an insult, {0_pronoun} disconnects.
LanguageData.FactionGreetingWary_Cheech: {0} hisses a greeting and asks what business you need done.
LanguageData.FactionGreetingWarm_Cheech: Barks out enthusiastically, {0} greets {NEGOTIATOR_labelShort} and asks what {LEADER_pronoun} can do to help you.
LanguageData.MilitaryAidSent_Cheech: {0} agrees to send cheech fighters to help you.
